page.title: 10RECENT HAPPENINGS IN BURTON
page.content: Burton Lazars is quite a boring village on the whole,with not alot of things to do in it.There is a church and a village hall and alot of old buildings.Burton Lazars also has some very exciting local history.We used to have a big horse racing circuit,this was in the early 20th century,and in 1935 it is said that the Grand National was held there. In 1985 the media came to the village and in one of the old houses on East Lane Central Television filmed a play about a family with plenty of arguing children. The supernatural came to the village in 1984 when 5 old people and cat all died in the space of one week,one of them at another's funeral.
